mapper.select: SELECT sres.* FROM sys_account sa LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON sa.id = su.accountid LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru ON sru.userid = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = sru.roleid LEFT JOIN sys_role_authgroup sra ON sra.roleid = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_authgroup sau ON sau.id = sra.groupid LEFT JOIN sys_authgroup_resource saur ON saur.groupid = sau.id LEFT JOIN sys_resource sres ON sres.id = saur.resourceid WHERE sa.account=#{account} and sres.parent!='' and sres.parent is not NULL ORDER BY sres.menuorder
